page.title: 18VISIT GLENLUCE
page.content: Glenluce and district caters solely for the country-loving{tourist.}Plenty of accommodation from hotels to camp-sites. {Naturalists}enjoy estuary and shore, birdwatching, glen and fell walking. {Sports }available are golf, bowls, trout and salmon fishing, shooting and pony-trekking. During the summer months {sheep dog trials}are popular with residents and tourists. { {Boat trips }to nature reserves like the Scar Rocks in Luce Bay are available, and sea angling trips can easily be arranged. {Ancient {monuments }are {Glenluce Abbey }and { {Castle of Park,}but there are mnay standing stones and cairns in the district for the keen historian. Nearby there are safe, sandy beaches for children to play and bathe.
